attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to follow our president’s campaign better but after signing up I kept getting text messages and notifications non stop. I tried to turn off notifications but the app would crash every time I tried. I’m very disappointed with this app as I was expecting better from our president. Make this app great again.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: At first I downloaded because I felt like “maybe I should try to understand y all of trumps supporters like him”. But the very second that I opened the app I went into liver failure and was rushed to the ER. While there, I had to be checked by the neurologist and he said that my brain cells had dissipated by at least half and that the only way I would recover is if I never see the orange man again❤️

attributes.title: Poorly designed, flawed functions
attributes.review: This app was a real disappointment, It did not bring me the latest news or up to date information regarding trump. this app requested my data and also took so much space and storage, it really isn’t an efficient app and i do not understand how an app so poorly could be made from a man with so much money. ridiculous

attributes.title: Soooo Glitchy
attributes.review: Okay so I just wanted to download this app to see our beloved🍊orange🍊 and to see what new news might come in ✨ about🍊Orange’s🍊 campaign and it was super glitchy it would always close the app and it would turn off my phone and if it never did that it would be super super laggy this was supposed to be a five star app to me but no it’s a one star if only Mr. Orange 🍊 would fix this ugh....🙂

attributes.title: Everything about it is a problem
attributes.review: I hate this app because it’s just a problem, why do we need it, it’s a problem, when I open the app it’s a problem, the design of this app is a problem when I found out its in the App Store its a problem, whoever made this app has problems, trump is a problem, America is a problem, did I mention problem?

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see about trumps campaign thing and then when I was going to sign in it asked for private information and I put my gmail and pass and other things it asked for and then I got a email saying I was hacked like WHAT,I mean I was expected this cause it’s trumps app and he hates People but overall you shouldn’t download this app cause it’s no good!😭😭

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: I hate this app. It kept making my phone crash. Mind you, my phone is a brand new iPhone 11. I literally bought it this week. It keeps closing me out of my apps and crashing everything! Not to mention it takes up sooo much storage. As well as that, when I’m on the app my battery goes down so fast. IT WENT DOWN 10% IN FIVE MINUTES! Do not get this app.

attributes.title: very scary
attributes.review: I was extremely excited to open this app and look at the greatest president we have ever had, mr. trump ! But, the second I opened the app, a portal to another dimension opened while flying monkeys flew out of the app ! They grabbed my two dogs, cat, and sick grandmother that I had been taking care of after her catching corona. Would not recommend opening this app. R.I.P maama, Jewels, Buttons and Sparky. you will be missed dearly 😔😭

attributes.title: A disappointment
attributes.review: I was very excited to download the app and see what our huge Cheeto would offer for the upcoming 4 years. He has done wonderful things, great thing, and was simply expecting the very best from this app. Turns out that it took me 5 weeks to download the app??? I was confused and disappointed with it. How can our great country allow this?? FDT. If you know you know.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app came with VERY bad side effects. a few minutes after getting it i started feeling super weird and when i looked in the mirror my skin was turning 🍊! not only was i now twinning with our 🍊 of a president but i also got this urge to do some very sexist, racist, and homophobic things! a few days passed and i started hallucinating and hearing very racist things. guys if you care about yourselves DONT GET THIS APP!!!
